Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Citrus Sukhumvit 22 Bangkok places you in the heart of Bangkok, walking distance from Benjasiri Park and Embassy of Argentina. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Emporium Shopping Complex and Embassy of India.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 90 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a Select Comfort bed. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features at this Art Deco hotel include babysitting/childcare and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Bangkok? This hotel has facilities measuring 38 square feet (4 square meters), including a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and limited parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Benjasiri Park - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Embassy of Argentina - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Emporium Shopping Complex - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Embassy of India - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Terminal 21 Shopping Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Benjakiti Park - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Queen Sirikit National Convention Center - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Embassy of Hungary - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Stock Exchange of Thailand - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
K Village - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
J Avenue Thonglor - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Embassy of Pakistan - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Bumrungrad Hospital - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Embassy of the United States - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Embassy of the United Kingdom - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi

The preferred airport for Citrus Sukhumvit 22 Bangkok is Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.) - 20.6 km / 12.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
